mil6.3.6:1.1: “Bhante nāgasena, ye te sattā maranti, sabbe te kāleyeva maranti, udāhu akālepi marantī”ti?
mil6.3.6:1.2: “Atthi, mahārāja, kālepi maraṇaṁ, atthi akālepi maraṇan”ti.
mil6.3.6:2.1: “Bhante nāgasena, ke kāle maranti, ke akāle marantī”ti?
mil6.3.6:2.2: “Diṭṭhapubbā pana, mahārāja, tayā ambarukkhā vā jamburukkhā vā, aññasmā vā pana phalarukkhā phalāni patantāni āmāni ca pakkāni cā”ti?
mil6.3.6:2.4: “Yāni tāni, mahārāja, phalāni rukkhato patanti, sabbāni tāni kāleyeva patanti, udāhu akālepī”ti?
mil6.3.6:2.5: “Yāni tāni, bhante nāgasena, phalāni paripakkāni vilīnāni patanti, sabbāni tāni kāle patanti.
mil6.3.6:2.6_0: Yāni pana tāni avasesāni phalāni tesu kānici kimividdhāni patanti, kānici laguḷahatāni
mil6.3.6:2.6_1: patanti, kānici vātappahatāni patanti, kānici antopūtikāni hutvā patanti, sabbāni
mil6.3.6:2.7: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, ye te jarāvegahatā maranti, teyeva kāle maranti, avasesā keci kammappaṭibāḷhā maranti, keci gatippaṭibāḷhā maranti, keci kiriyappaṭibāḷhā marantī”ti.
mil6.3.6:3.1_0: “Bhante nāgasena, ye te kammappaṭibāḷhā maranti, yepi te gatippaṭibāḷhā maranti,
mil6.3.6:3.1_1: yepi te kiriyappaṭibāḷhā maranti, yepi te jarāvegappaṭibāḷhā maranti, sabbe te kāleyeva
mil6.3.6:3.1_2: maranti, yopi mātukucchigato marati, so tassa kālo, kāleyeva so marati.
mil6.3.6:3.2: Yopi vijātaghare marati, so tassa kālo, sopi kāleyeva marati.
mil6.3.6:3.4: yopi vassasatiko marati, so tassa kālo, kāleyeva so marati, tena hi, bhante nāgasena, akāle maraṇaṁ nāma na hoti, ye keci maranti, sabbe te kāleyeva marantī”ti.
mil6.3.6:4.1: “Sattime, mahārāja, vijjamānepi uttariṁ āyusmiṁ akāle maranti.
mil6.3.6:4.3: Jighacchito, mahārāja, bhojanaṁ alabhamāno upahatabbhantaro vijjamānepi uttariṁ āyusmiṁ akāle marati;
mil6.3.6:4.4: pipāsito, mahārāja, pānīyaṁ alabhamāno parisukkhahadayo vijjamānepi uttariṁ āyusmiṁ akāle marati;
mil6.3.6:4.5: ahinā daṭṭho, mahārāja, visavegābhihato tikicchakaṁ alabhamāno vijjamānepi uttariṁ āyusmiṁ akāle marati;
mil6.3.6:4.6: visamāsito, mahārāja, ḍayhantesu aṅgapaccaṅgesu agadaṁ alabhamāno vijjamānepi uttariṁ āyusmiṁ akāle marati;
mil6.3.6:4.7: aggigato, mahārāja, jhāyamāno nibbāpanaṁ alabhamāno vijjamānepi uttariṁ āyusmiṁ akāle marati;
mil6.3.6:4.8: udakagato, mahārāja, patiṭṭhaṁ alabhamāno vijjamānepi uttariṁ āyusmiṁ akāle marati;
mil6.3.6:4.9: sattihato, mahārāja, ābādhiko bhisakkaṁ alabhamāno vijjamānepi uttariṁ āyusmiṁ akāle marati;
mil6.3.6:4.10: ime kho, mahārāja, satta vijjamānepi uttariṁ āyusmiṁ akāle maranti.
mil6.3.6:5.1_0: Aṭṭhavidhena, mahārāja, sattānaṁ kālaṅkiriyā hoti, vātasamuṭṭhānena pittasamuṭṭhānena
mil6.3.6:5.1_1: semhasamuṭṭhānena sannipātikena utuvipariṇāmena visamaparihārena opakkamikena kammavipākena,
mil6.3.6:5.2: Tatra, mahārāja, yadidaṁ kammavipākena kālaṅkiriyā, sāyeva tattha sāmayikā kālaṅkiriyā, avasesā asāmayikā kālaṅkiriyāti.
mil6.3.6:7.1: Keci, mahārāja, sattā pubbe katena tena tena akusalakammavipākena maranti.
mil6.3.6:7.2_0: Idha, mahārāja, yo pubbe pare jighacchāya māreti, so bahūni vassasatasahassāni jighacchāya
mil6.3.6:7.2_1: paripīḷito chāto parikilanto sukkhamilātahadayo bubhukkhito visukkhito jhāyanto abbhantaraṁ
mil6.3.6:7.2_2: pariḍayhanto jighacchāyayeva marati daharopi majjhimopi mahallakopi, idampi tassa sāmayikamaraṇaṁ.
mil6.3.6:8.1_0: Yo pubbe pare pipāsāya māreti, so bahūni vassasatasahassāni peto hutvā nijjhāmataṇhiko
mil6.3.6:8.1_1: samāno lūkho kiso parisukkhitahadayo pipāsāyayeva marati daharopi majjhimopi mahallakopi,
mil6.3.6:9.1_0: Yo pubbe pare ahinā ḍaṁsāpetvā māreti, so bahūni vassasatasahassāni ajagaramukheneva
mil6.3.6:9.1_1: ajagaramukhaṁ kaṇhasappamukheneva kaṇhasappamukhaṁ parivattitvā tehi khāyitakhāyito
mil6.3.6:9.1_2: ahīhi daṭṭhoyeva marati daharopi majjhimopi mahallakopi, idampi tassa sāmayikamaraṇaṁ.
mil6.3.6:10.1_0: Yo pubbe pare visaṁ datvā māreti, so bahūni vassasatasahassāni ḍayhantehi aṅgapaccaṅgehi
mil6.3.6:10.1_1: bhijjamānena sarīrena kuṇapagandhaṁ vāyanto viseneva marati daharopi majjhimopi mahallakopi,
mil6.3.6:11.1_0: Yo pubbe pare agginā māreti, so bahūni vassasatasahassāni aṅgārapabbateneva aṅgārapabbataṁ
mil6.3.6:11.1_1: yamavisayeneva yamavisayaṁ parivattitvā daḍḍhavidaḍḍhagatto aggināyeva marati daharopi
mil6.3.6:12.1_0: Yo pubbe pare udakena māreti, so bahūni vassasatasahassāni hataviluttabhaggadubbalagatto
mil6.3.6:12.1_1: khubbhitacitto udakeneva marati daharopi majjhimopi mahallakopi, idampi tassa sāmayikamaraṇaṁ.
mil6.3.6:13.1_0: Yo pubbe pare sattiyā māreti, so bahūni vassasatasahassāni chinnabhinnakoṭṭitavikoṭṭito
mil6.3.6:13.1_1: sattimukhasamāhato sattiyāyeva marati daharopi majjhimopi mahallakopi, idampi tassa sāmayikamaraṇaṁ”.
mil6.3.6:14.1: “Bhante nāgasena, akāle maraṇaṁ atthīti yaṁ vadesi, iṅgha me tvaṁ tattha kāraṇaṁ atidisāti”.
mil6.3.6:14.2: “Yathā, mahārāja, mahatimahāaggikkhandho ādinnatiṇakaṭṭhasākhāpalāso pariyādinnabhakkho upādānasaṅkhayā nibbāyati, so aggi vuccati ‘anītiko anupaddavo samaye nibbuto nāmā’ti;
mil6.3.6:14.3: evameva kho, mahārāja, yo koci bahūni divasasahassāni jīvitvā jarājiṇṇo āyukkhayā anītiko anupaddavo marati, so vuccati ‘samaye maraṇamupagato’ti.
mil6.3.6:15.1_0: Yathā vā pana, mahārāja, mahatimahāaggikkhandho ādinnatiṇakaṭṭhasākhāpalāso assa,
mil6.3.6:15.1_1: taṁ apariyādinneyeva tiṇakaṭṭhasākhāpalāse mahatimahāmegho abhippavassitvā nibbāpeyya,
mil6.3.6:15.1_2: api nu kho, mahārāja, mahāaggikkhandho samaye nibbuto nāma hotī”ti?
mil6.3.6:15.3: “Kissa pana so, mahārāja, pacchimo aggikkhandho purimakena aggikkhandhena samasamagatiko nāhosī”ti?
mil6.3.6:15.4: “Āgantukena, bhante, meghena paṭipīḷito so aggikkhandho asamaye nibbuto”ti.
mil6.3.6:15.5_0: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, yo koci akāle marati, so āgantukena rogena paṭipīḷito vātasamuṭṭhānena
mil6.3.6:15.5_1: vā pittasamuṭṭhānena vā semhasamuṭṭhānena vā sannipātikena vā utupariṇāmajena vā

mil6.3.6:15.5_3: visamāsitena vā agginā vā udakena vā sattivegappaṭipīḷito vā akāle marati.
mil6.3.6:15.6: Idamettha, mahārāja, kāraṇaṁ, yena kāraṇena akāle maraṇaṁ atthi.
mil6.3.6:16.1: Yathā vā pana, mahārāja, gagane mahatimahāvalāhako uṭṭhahitvā ninnañca thalañca paripūrayanto abhivassati, so vuccati ‘megho anītiko anupaddavo vassatī’ti;
